channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kirby Air Riders is radically simple alternative to racing classics like Mario Kart
item.description: Simple mechanics and diverse modes turn Kirby Air Riders into a racing game to rival Mario Kart World, a fellow Nintendo Switch 2 exclusive.

item.title: Flu season could be nasty this winter
item.description: With a new flu virus variant circulating, scientists fear more sickness this winter. The vaccine may be slightly less effective, but doctors still urg...

item.title: World Toilet Day is today! Um .. is that really the best name?
item.description: November 19 is World Toilet Day — officially declared by the United Nations to bring attention to the the 3.4 billion people who live without "safely ...

item.title: Dems may have an advantage in the 2026 midterms. And, Trump defends Saudi crown prince
item.description: President Trump defends Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman during a White House visit. And, a new NPR/PBS News/Marist poll reveals the president's...

item.title: Student escapes as authorities search for 24 other girls abducted in Nigeria
item.description: A schoolgirl who was abducted with 24 others from a dormitory in northwestern Nigeria has escaped and is safe, as hunters joined security forces in th...

item.title: Child care costs more than the rent in dozens of U.S. cities
item.description: In some metro areas, child care expenses amount to more than double what families spend on rent, LendingTree found.

item.title: Tom Steyer mounts 2026 bid for California governor, adding to crowded field
item.description: Businessman Tom Steyer is entering the already crowded race for California governor in 2026.

item.title: Epstein bill heading to Trump's desk after clearing final hurdle in Congress
item.description: The House sent to the Senate a bill that would force the release of the Epstein files, the final procedural move before President Trump's signature.

item.title: Nicki Minaj supports contested Trump claim Christians being persecuted in Nigeria
item.description: The US-based Trinidadian rapper addressed the UN in New York alongside Trump administration officials, making claims that lack evidence.

item.title: Children among 25 killed in one of Russia's deadliest strikes on western Ukraine
item.description: Two blocks of flats were attacked in the western city of Ternopil. One was almost destroyed.

item.title: All 246 passengers rescued after ferry runs aground in South Korea
item.description: The vessel is stuck on a reef and unable to move, but there is no risk of sinking, the Coast Guard said.

item.title: Epstein abuse survivor Annie Farmer reacts to votes on Epstein files
item.description: Annie Farmer, one of the women who has been outspoken about the abuse she endured when she was younger, is reacting to the process in Congress for the...

item.title: What to know about expanded work requirements about to kick in for SNAP
Kenyan authorities paid trolls to threaten Gen Z protesters, Amnesty says
item.description: A widespread campaign sought to "silence and suppress" protesters, Amnesty International says.

item.title: All 246 passengers rescued after ferry runs aground in South Korea
item.description: The vessel is stuck on a reef and unable to move, but there is no risk of sinking, the Coast Guard said.

item.title: House formally sends Epstein files bill to the Senate on its way to Trump's desk
item.description: The House officially sent the Epstein Files Transparency Act to the Senate for formal approval, and it's expected to arrive at President Trump's desk ...

item.title: DHS plans to deploy 250 border agents to Louisiana in major immigration sweep, AP sources say
item.description: Federal agents are set to conduct a major immigration crackdown called “Swamp Sweep” in New Orleans in the coming weeks.

item.title: Fear spreads as federal immigration crackdown in North Carolina expands to Raleigh
